README:
This repo contains part of the code (in MATLAB and Mathematica) used to generate results in paper http://arxiv.org/pdf/1004.4272.pdf published in Quantitative Finance.

Ester Pantaleo, Michele Tumminello, Fabrizio Lillo, and Rosario N. Mantegna "When do improved covariance matrix estimators enhance
portfolio optimization? An empirical comparative study of nine
estimators" Quantitative Finance, Volume 11, Issue 7, 2011 

Folder data contains part of the data used in the same paper.
description: code to compare different covariance matrix estimators for portfolio optimization
